quoteFirst: Laying hold of my gun, I ventured to take aim, though my horse kept going on at a good rate. It was a quarter past
quoteLast: , yet not at all dark. I was lucky enough to hit the bird, but in such a manner that one side of it was too much damaged to allow of stuffing and preserving the specimen. (This was the _Strix Ulula_, the Latin description of which, made on the spot, is given, somewhat, corrected, in the _Fauna Suecica_; but the annexed sketch is too great a curiosity to be suppressed).

quoteFirst: It has made laws of its own. Its members have inaugurated a reign of lawlessness that may drag you out of your bed
